Reviews.Title: Good (OK)
Reviews.Author: deangelo
Reviews.Content: This was Good (OK) Need help like 10% "i will say" But It's okay Keep up the good work. :)

Reviews.Title: It is trash, garbage, rubbish, junk ...! Doesn't even deserve a single star!
Reviews.Author: T. Kilic "Blue Dream"
Reviews.Content: I really regret that I purchased this. It is cheap plastic, nothing works as expected. Motion detector's sound is hard to hear even when I am right next to it. It is like a silent alarm, really, almost no sound. I didn't want to waste my time by writing a review about this security(!) system but I just want people who might consider buying this item to know that this is absolutely useless for security purposes. Please save your money and don't waste your time. I threw mine right away, I mean everything. It is a big disappointment and I didn't even bother myself to return it. Simply, it is in the trash where it is supposed to be.

Reviews.Title: very good item. no problems and easy set up
Reviews.Author: larryroyc
Reviews.Content: fast shipping, works great, easy set up. would recommend to anyone looking to beef their curremt security or set up a new one

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This thing is a flimsy plastic P.O.S. that works poorly. The security code does not work as described in the instructions. Does NOT enable the alarm when entered...multiple entries must be used foer it to work. One of then remote sensors is DOA as well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Keypad with Door/Window Sensor and Panic Button (requires 3 AA batteries)
Motion Detector (requires 3 AA batteries)
4 Wireless Magnetic Door/Window Alarms (each requires 2 AAA batteries)
Security System Warning Window Stickers
Batteries not Included
ProductInfo.Name: 6pc Home Security System
